school_name: University of Pittsburgh School of Law
comments: Prof. Teeter is the nicest lady ever; if you have any problems she is always willing to help. Pitt Law needs more professors like her who actually care (most professors just give scantron tests, don\'t even know your name, and hate the fact they have to teach) -- you can tell, though, that Teeter knows her stuff, and likes and is good at teaching.

school_name: University of Pittsburgh School of Law
University of Pittsburgh School of Law
comments: I took Professor Teeter\'s Advanced Legal Writing course, and I found her to be knowledgable, dedicated, and down to earth.

school_name: University of Pittsburgh School of Law
comments: Prof. Teeter taught at Duquesne Law last year and endeared herself to our class. Pitt is extremely lucky to have recruited her. She\'s very knowledgeable, cares about her students, and does her best to ensure they succeed. Great teacher!
